Grade: 95

Comment: The student has provided a thorough and accurate explanation of the strategies Jesus used to resist the temptations presented by Satan. The student effectively highlighted the importance of relying on the Word of God, staying focused on God's will, and utilizing the power of prayer in overcoming temptation. The integration of relevant Scripture references adds depth and clarity to the response. Overall, this is a well-written and doctrinally sound analysis. Great job!
